name: Frog Smith
description:
Play as a blacksmith frog, accept contracts and make the items. First you must heat the metal to the perfect temperature indicated on the bar, and then hammer it into shape. Reheat as needed. Once the item is complete quench it to cool it down! The quality of the item will determine your reward, so make them good.

Controls:

  • [A, Left] - Move left
  • [D, Right] - Move right
  • [Space, Left Mouse Button] - Interact with the work station you're at
  • [ESC] - Pause game

I accidentally lost the source code, oops. 🤷
